List.Title: MockList
List.Description: Just a mock list to use for prototyping.
List.Name: {F5345FE7-2F7C-49F7-87D0-DBFEBDD0CE61}

Field.Description: This is a boolean field. Default option is yes.
Field.Name: Boolean

Field.Description: This is a currency field. The minimum value is 1 and the maximum value is 20.
Field.Name: Currency

Field.Description: This is just a date. It defaults the current date.
Field.Name: Date

Field.Description: This is a Date and Time with no default value.
Field.Name: DateTime

Field.Description: This is a simple integer. Decimal places are set to 0 places.
Field.Name: Integer

Field.Description: This is a JSON field. Just plain text and 4 lines long.
Field.Name: JSON

Field.Description: This is a reference to a user's name. No presence.
Field.Name: User

Field.Description: Multiple users referencing the user name with presence.
Field.Name: UserMulti

Field.Description: This is a read only field that consists of the Title.
Field.Name: Calculated

Field.Description: Multiple choice option. Also allows fill-in choices.
Field.Name: MultiChoice

Field.Description: This is an enhanced rich text field with 4 rows for editing.
Field.Name: HTML

Field.Description: This is a rich text field that we use as a plain textarea. It has 5 rows visible and is required.
Field.Name: Note

Field.Description: This is a floating point number that is required to be unique.
Field.Name: Float

Field.Description: This is a picture....check it out!
Field.Name: Picture

Default.HTML: <table height="100%" cellspacing="0" class="ms-unselectedtitle itx" onmouseover="OnItem(this)" CTXName="ctx
